APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS
AGE: To apply you must take into consideration the students age in the following grade levels:

• PRE-KINDER: The student is 4 years old before June 30th.
• KINDER: The student is 5 years old before June 30th.
• FIRST GRADE: The student is 6 years old before June 30th.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”4px||5px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ custom_margin=”25px|auto|31px|auto||” border_radii=”on|32px|32px|32px|32px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|30px||30px|false|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To ensure our students’ experiences and academic quality we have limited admissions, so we strongly advise our upcoming families to start their admissions process as soon as possible.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”34px” text_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

OUR ADMISSIONS PROCESS

Get to know our educational project

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#555555″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-5px|||||” custom_padding=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you wish to receive more information about the Altamira school and visit our campus. Contact us via Whatsapp 3138494888.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding=”20px|25px|20px|25px|false|false” border_radii=”on|32px|32px|32px|32px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”]

3 – Interview with the school’s Counserlor and academic ASSESSMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#555555″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”|||50px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Once the school receives the required documents, the applicants will be contacted by the admissions committee to schedule an in campus appointment. The applicant will take the academic screening.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”0px|20px|0px|20px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#2F3477″ divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||-5px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”22px|20px||20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”|800||on|||||” text_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_font_size=”30px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#b9171a” header_3_font_size=”37px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”|0px|13px|0px|false|true” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”24px” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”16px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

4 – RESPONSE OF THE ADMISSION PROCESS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#555555″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”|||50px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]
The committee will take a certain amount of time to provide responses to applicant families and will send an email with the response regarding the admission decision, remembering that it will be subject to availability of places. The school reserves the right of admission.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
ADMISSIONS PROCESSAPPLICATION REQUIREMENTSAGE: To apply you must take into consideration the students age in the following grade levels: • PRE-KINDER: The student is 4 years old before June 30th.• KINDER: The student is 5 years old before June 30th.• FIRST GRADE: The student is 6 years old before June 30th.To ensure our students’ experiences and academic quality we have limited admissions, so we strongly advise our upcoming families to start their admissions process as soon as possible.OUR ADMISSIONS PROCESSGet to know our educational projectIf you wish to receive more information about the Altamira school and visit our campus. Contact us via Whatsapp 3138494888.It is important to keep in mind that to apply to the Altamira school and due to having limited quotas, we recommend to next families, apply one or two years in advance.1 – RegistrationIf you wish to apply to our school and begin the admission process please fill out the following form. https://controlacademic.co/altamira/preinscripcion.aspx Make the payment of the admission costs according to the rates and preference of payment methods listed below:

REGISTER COSTS
